result.eng: I am thinking of leaving tomorrow.
result.ga: Tá mé ag cuimhneamh ar imeacht amárach
result.orig: Tá mé ag cuimhneamh ar imeacht amárach
result.html: Tá mé ag cuimhneamh ar imeacht amárachI am thinking of leaving tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag cuiṁneaṁ ar imeaċt amáraċI am thinking of leaving tomorrow.

result.eng: Are you thinking of moving to this area?
result.ga: An bhfuil tú ag cuimhneamh ar aistriú go dtí an ceantar seo
result.orig: An bhfuil tú ag cuimhneamh ar aistriú go dtí an ceantar seo
result.html: An bhfuil tú ag cuimhneamh ar aistriú go dtí an ceantar seoAre you thinking of moving to this area?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tú ag cuiṁneaṁ ar aistriú go dtí an ceantar seoAre you thinking of moving to this area?

result.eng: I was thinking, I'd love to go to the party after all.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag cuimhneamh ba bhreá liom a dhul chuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoil
result.orig: Bhí mé ag cuimhneamh ba bhreá liom a dhul chuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoil
result.html: Bhí mé ag cuimhneamh ba bhreá liom a dhul chuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoilI was thinking, I'd love to go to the party after all.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag cuiṁneaṁ ba ḃreá liom a ḋul ċuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoilI was thinking, I'd love to go to the party after all.

result.eng: It has to be remembered that...
result.html: Caithfear cuimhneamh goIt has to be remembered that...
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfear cuiṁneaṁ goIt has to be remembered that...
